description: Retrieves the details of a specific invocation step within an invocation in a session. For more information about sessions, see Store and retrieve conversation history and context with Amazon Bedrock sessions.

parameters.name: invocationIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the invocation in UUID format.

parameters.name: invocationStepId
parameters.description: The unique identifier (in UUID format) for the specific invocation step to retrieve.

parameters.name: sessionIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the invocation step's associated session. You can specify either the session's sessionId or its Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: invocationStep
nested_items.description: The complete details of the requested invocation step.

nested_items.name: invocationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier (in UUID format) for the invocation that includes the invocation step.

nested_items.name: invocationStepId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier (in UUID format) for the invocation step.

nested_items.name: invocationStepTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the invocation step was created.

nested_items.name: contentBlocks
nested_items.description: The content for the invocation step.

nested_items.name: bytes
nested_items.description: The raw image bytes for the image. If you use an Amazon Web Services SDK, you don't need to encode the image bytes in base64.

nested_items.name: s3Location
nested_items.description: The path to the Amazon S3 bucket where the image is stored.

nested_items.name: uri
nested_items.description: The path to the Amazon S3 bucket where the image is stored.

nested_items.name: text
nested_items.description: The text in the invocation step.

nested_items.name: sessionId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the session containing the invocation step.
